name: Today (unlostpixel)
description:
Timothee is a depressed man in the 1700s, he's trying to find meaning in his life and maybe finds it in helping others.

KNOWN BUG
There's a bug that if you use your mouse for anything, even changing tabs or something, it messes up with the dialogue boxes and can't trigger the next one! So, after pressing play, don't use your mouse for anything until you reach the credits.

CONTROLS
WASD or arrow keys to move
Space to interact
Enter to continue dialogue

TEAM
Unlost Pixel- Art, Code, design, story
Alaska - Art, story
Samuel - SFX
Garrett Rose - Music
